mapper.update: UPDATE seckill SET number = number - 1 WHERE seckill_id = #{seckillId} AND #{killTime} BETWEEN start_time AND end_time AND number > 0
mapper.select: SELECT seckill_id, name, number, create_time, start_time, end_time FROM seckill WHERE seckill_id = #{seckillId}
SELECT seckill_id, name, number, create_time, start_time, end_time FROM seckill ORDER BY start_time asc LIMIT #{offset},#{limit}
